kycForm.residencyStatusDescription: Based on your country of residence {{country}}, you may be required to provide additional information.

residencyStatusOptions.resident: Sole resident - I live in and am legally/tax resident only in the country above
residencyStatusOptions.dual_resident: Dual resident - I am legally/tax resident in more than one country
residencyStatusOptions.non_resident: Non-resident - I do not live in or am not considered a resident of the country above
